titles: A shadovv of the victory of Christ, represented to the Honourable House of Commons, in a sermon preached at Margarets Westminster on the day of the publick fast, Octob. 28. 1646. / By John Maynard, Minister of the Gospel at Mayfield in Sussex.
author: Maynard, John, 1600-1665.
publisher: Printed by F: Neile for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his shop at the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
